actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require the redetermination of the boundaries of the metropolitan statistical areas, primary metropolitan statistical areas, and consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to redetermine, on the basis of the 1990 census, the boundaries of the metropolitan (including the primary and consolidated) statistical areas of the United States, and to publish the results in the Federal Register by June 30, 1992.

titles.title: To require the redetermination of the boundaries of the metropolitan statistical areas, primary metropolitan statistical areas, and consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of the United States, and for other purposes.
